page.title: 21Modern Shopping in Gretton
page.content:
Shopping in Gretton has vastly changed, out of four shops only 1 remains. The post office. It sells many everyday items, including sweets, toys, magazines and a Dvd rental to name a few. The post office is heavily relied on, as many ederly people do their weekly shops. My favourite thing to do, is to walk down on a Sunday morning after breakfast and get some sweets and a the newspaper for my Dad. I really want to know what Gretton will be like in 25 years time
Laura Seymour
